overview: How do you like it? The hot and hung studs of Titan have two rules: Hard And Fast. So hop on board and strap yourself in as TitanMen exclusive Leo Alarcon leads a team of trained professionals on a wild ride that will leave your head spinning -- and your mouth begging for more. Driver Spencer Reed picks up stranger Adam Knox, leading to a heated outdoor encounter highlighted by an amazing sit-down fuck. Movers Adam Russo and Dante Sabel have time to kill. What better way to stay sweaty than with a heated flip fuck? Dark, handsome and hairy trio Leo Alarcon, Shay and Sean Stavos get connected in an unforgettably intense threesome that sparks off the screen.
title: Hard And Fast
